description.p: This damp, slimy bag is enchanted to summon leeches at dawn each day. The bag contains 1d10 empty leeches, which magically sustain themselves while inside the bag. Any leeches remaining at the next dawn, whether full or empty, shrivel up and die.

An empty leech can be applied to a creature within 5 feet as an action. The leech drains 1 hit point from the creature, becoming full. A full leech can then be fed to another creature within 5 feet as an action, restoring 1 hit point to that creature.

The bag can hold up to 10 leeches at a time. Excess leeches die if added to a full bag. Once removed from the bag, leeches can survive no longer than 24 hours, after which they perish regardless of their state.
If the bag is pierced, torn, or otherwise damaged, its magic is destroyed, and it can no longer summon leeches.
